context: Palantir went public via direct listing in September 2020. The company was heavily focused on government contracts (especially defense and intelligence) while expanding commercial business. COVID-19 pandemic showcased Palantir's capabilities through NHS contact tracing work in UK. Competition intensified from cloud providers and specialized analytics platforms like Databricks. Palantir differentiated with Gotham (government) and Foundry (commercial) platforms.
